name: Spell crafter (Spell crafters)
description:
Welcome to Spell Crafter, the rogue lite game that will test your skills and strategy! Dive into a world of magic with dynamic combat and spell casting, where every decision counts.

If you have played the game please fill up this form to help us !
 https://forms.gle/kbZKwiFiccn8q6K76

-----[ A unique spell system ]-----

In Spell Crafter, spells are not just pre-made abilities that you select from a menu. Instead, you'll cast and customize your spells during combat, just like a real mage would do. 

With dynamic combat and spell casting, Spell Crafter offers an immersive and engaging gameplay experience that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Get ready to unleash your inner mage and create your own spells as you battle your way through the dungeons!

-----[ Procedural dungeons ]-----

Experience replayability with procedural dungeons and room variations that provide endless surprises and challenges.

-----[ Get stronger]-----

Use the relic system to customize your playstyle and power up your character as you progress through the dungeon. And use the mana shard you collect in the dungeon to upgrade your mage powers between dungeon runs !

-----[ Boss fight ]-----

Prepare yourself for epic boss fights that will test your strength, as you battle against powerful boss in order to claim your victory.

-----[ A mysterious story ]-----

With a rich lore codex, you'll unravel the secrets of the world and discover the true nature of magic.

-----[ Controls and save system ]-----

Take control of your gaming experience with key rebinding and a flexible save system that allows you to pick up where you left off, whenever you want. With gamepad support, you'll feel completely immersed in the game.

Are you ready to become a master spell crafter? The challenge awaits!

-----[ A message from the team ]-----

Please note that Spell Crafter is a game made by a group of dedicated students and is still currently in development. Our team is working hard to bring you the best possible gaming experience, so please bear with us as we continue to make improvements and expand the content of the game.
We appreciate your support and feedback as we work to make Spell Crafters the  game you will enjoy to play. Thank you for joining us on this exciting journey!
